Skills: The ideal candidate should have the ability to effectively manage the operations of an HVAC company in Riyadh, with a strong emphasis on air conditioning. They should have a background in sales in Saudi Arabia with strong connections, enabling them to secure B2B supply and installation contracts (e.g., VRV, Chillers, Solar) as well as maintenance agreements (e.g., Air Conditioning, Air Balancing, Chillers, Direct Expansion). Additionally, the candidate will oversee 10 teams of technicians responsible for daily B2C tasks.

Years of Experience: 15+ years
Qualifications: Bachelor of Science (minimum)
